touchTargets.rule: Ensure minimum 44x44 logical pixels for all interactive elements
touchTargets.strategy: Use padding or transparent containers to extend hit areas for smaller icons

feedbackStates.disabled: Apply 0.4 opacity and disable hit testing (GlobalStyles.disabledOpacity)
feedbackStates.focus: Apply 2px ring with primary color offset by 2px (GlobalStyles.focusRingColor)

navigation.transitions: Use standard easing (Cubic 0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1) with 250ms duration for page routes

accessibilityStandards.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 ratio for text against background
accessibilityStandards.scaling: All font sizes must use .sp extension from flutter_screenutil
accessibilityStandards.motion: Respect 'reduce motion' settings by setting animation durations to 0ms when requested

motionDesign.entranceCurve: Decelerate (Out) - for elements entering the screen
motionDesign.exitCurve: Accelerate (In) - for elements leaving the screen
motionDesign.defaultCurve: Standard Cubic (GlobalStyles.easingStandard) - for on-screen state changes

responsiveSizing: ALWAYS use flutter_screenutil extensions for all numeric dimensions.
Use .w for horizontal widths, margins, and padding.
Use .h for vertical heights and spacing.
Use .r for border radius to ensure circular shapes stay circular.
Use .sp for all font sizes to respect user text scaling preferences.
typographyUsage: Map 'Geist' font family strictly to Headings (H1-H6).
Map 'Manrope' font family to Body, Buttons, and Captions.
Do not hardcode font families; reference GlobalStyles.fontFamilyHeading and GlobalStyles.fontFamilyBody.
componentRules: Buttons: Must have 8.r border radius and medium vibrancy colors.
Cards: Must use 12.r radius and 'surfaceMain' background color.
Inputs: Default border color is #E0E0E0; Focus border is primaryMain (#64B5F6).
codeStyle: Use static const variables from GlobalStyles instead of raw hex codes.
Wrap root widgets in ScreenUtilInit to enable responsive sizing.
